content: Hi Guys,SUPER SUNDAY is here! What a day ahead we have..  Honest Joe Mac and myself are in Southampton for the match vs Liverpool.. unfortunately, Southampton's last match in Premier League for a while..We have a couple of Sportsbet guys at Arsenal v Wolves today as well..   The Indian Premier League T20 Final is here!!  CSK play the Titans can the experience of Dhoni in the CSK side help them beat the new boys, GT today?   Monaco F1 GP in Monte Carlo - rain was forecast?!! What a race that would be!   Indianapolis 500 in the States, that's Indy's big race of the year..  French Open Tennis starts!And sooo much more!What will you guys be looking out for today?SHARE YOUR BETSLIPS HERE and Joe Mac & I will pick 10 Users to win 2x 1 mbtc Free bets each!best of luck!Steve.Sportsbet.io

comments.author: 1miau
comments.body: Interesting bets here.  I've placed a few bets on today's Monaco F1 Grand Prix. Unfortunately, taking some risk here didn't pay off as Mercedes gained a few places very late in the rain to turn my bet into a loss.  Maybe next time.  At least Ferrari screwed it up, as usual.  And Man City just didn't want to score today. Luckily for my bet, Brentford won against Pep's team.
